页面导航
vue
<template>
    <div class="core-container">
        <div class="scroll-wrapper"
             ref="scrollRef">
            <div class="scroll-content">
                <div class="scroll-item"
                     v-for="(v, k) in list"
                     :key="k">{{v}}</div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <button @click="add()">add</button>
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref, onMounted } from 'vue'
import BScroll from '@better-scroll/core'

const bs = ref({})
const scrollRef = ref()

onMounted(() => {
    bs.value = new BScroll(scrollRef.value, {
        disableMouse: true,
        disableTouch: true
    })
})

let index = 0
let inc = 0
const showLength = 7
const maxLength = showLength * 2 + 2

const list = ref(new Array(maxLength))

const add = () => {
    if (index == maxLength) {
        bs.value.scrollTo(0, 0, 0)
        index = showLength + 1
    }
    list.value[index] = `Vue3.0 无缝滚动组件展示数据第${inc}条`
    if (index > showLength) {
        bs.value.scrollBy(0, -50, 200)
        list.value[index - showLength - 1] = `Vue3.0 无缝滚动组件展示数据第${inc}条`
    }
    index++
    inc++
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
.core-container {
    .scroll-wrapper {
        height: 400px;
        position: relative;
        overflow: hidden;
        .scroll-content {
            padding-bottom: 50px;
        }
        .scroll-item {
            height: 50px;
            line-height: 50px;
            font-size: 24px;
            font-weight: bold;
            border-bottom: 1px solid #eee;
            text-align: center;
            &:nth-child(2n) {
                background-color: #f3f5f7;
            }
            &:nth-child(2n + 1) {
                background-color: #42b983;
            }
        }
    }
}
</style>
vue
<template>
    <div class="core-container">
        <div class="scroll-wrapper"
             ref="scrollRef">
            <div class="scroll-content">
                <div class="scroll-item"
                     v-for="(v, k) in list"
                     :key="k">{{v}}</div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref, onMounted } from 'vue'
import gsap from 'gsap'
    
const queue = []
const timeLine = gsap.timeline()

onMounted(() => {

    add()
})

let index = 0
let inc = 0
const showLength = 8
const maxLength = showLength * 2 + 1
const animationTime = 500

const list = ref(new Array(maxLength))

const add = async () => {
    while (true) { // eslint-disable-line
        const data = queue.shift()
        if (!data) {
            await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, animationTime))
            continue
        }

        if (index == maxLength) {
            timeLine.to('.scroll-content', { y: 0, duration: 0 })
            index = showLength
        }

        let duration = 1
        if (queue.length > 100) {
            duration = 0.2
        } else if (queue.length > 10) {
            duration = 0.5
        }

        list.value[index] = `Vue3.0 无缝滚动组件展示数据第${inc}条`
        if (index >= showLength) {
            timeLine.to('.scroll-content', { y: '-=50', duration: duration, delay: 0.1, ease: 'power1.inOut' })
            await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, duration * 1000 + 100))
            if (index > showLength) {
                list.value[index - showLength - 1] = `Vue3.0 无缝滚动组件展示数据第${inc}条`
            }
        }
        index++
        inc++
    }
}

const add2 = () => {
    queue.push('message.body')
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
.core-container {
    .scroll-wrapper {
        height: 400px;
        position: relative;
        overflow: hidden;
        .scroll-item {
            height: 50px;
            line-height: 50px;
            font-size: 24px;
            font-weight: bold;
            border-bottom: 1px solid #eee;
            text-align: center;
        }
    }
}
</style>
